text: @realDonaldTrump Since taking Office, the USA is a joke to the World! You did NOT create the best Economy, you inherited it !  What you have done is plunge the US into the worst economy since the Great Depression!  You acted too late with COVID-19 and the families of those lost will vote you out!

entity.description: This page is a timeline of Tweets with the latest information and updates on COVID-19 from experts, journalists, health authorities and other trusted sources from around the world. For more on COVID-19, visit: twitter.com/explore/tabs/covid-19
